#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll dp[51][51];

inline ll f(int i, int j){
    if(i == 0 && j == 0)
        return 1;

    if(i < 0 || j < 0) return 0;
    if( dp[i][j] != -1 ) return dp[i][j];
    return dp[i][j] = f(i-1,j) + f(i,j-1);
}

int main(){
    int x,y;
    cin >> x >> y;
    x = abs(x);
    y = abs(y);
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
    cout << f(x,y);
}
